Envitech Ltd - Water and Wastewater monitoring  Search: Call us on... 029 2036 4252 Home News Contact Us Jobs Log In Applications Industry Waste Water Process Effluent Monitoring Water River and Lakes Marine Water Monitoring Products Parameters Ammonia Monitoring Phosphate Analyser Options Nitrate Dissolved Oxygen Monitors Suspended Solids/Turbidity Toxicity Oil Detection Algae Measurement PH, Redox, Conductivity Multiparameter Specific Chemical Carbon Load Biological Oxygen Demand (BOD) Chemical Oxygen Demand (COD) Total Organic Carbon (TOC) Laboratory & Field Macherey Nagel Photometers Macherey Nagel Tests and Equipment Nanocolor – Water Test Kits Visocolor water analysis Quantofix Portable Analysis Lab Respirometers Manual Samplers Flow Magflux Open Channel Services Workshop Equipment Repair Calibration and Testing Site Service Site Surveys Install & Commissioning Maintenance Contracts Training Data Access Gosys Bluegate Sonde Telemetry Solutions Energy Reduction In-Situ Measurement Frameworks Intake Protection Product Loss Process Optimisation Bespoke Water Measurement Solutions MultiSys_Bluemon Optical Sensors Portable Turbidity – mains flushing project River and Marine Algae Differentiation Biomonitoring Toxicity Versatile lab solutions Case Studies Municipal Wastewater Process Control Optical Dissolved Oxygen Effluent Compliance Anaerobic and Aerobic Respirometry Environmental Monitoring Water Monitoring – Novel Measurement Technology Algae Detection Oil Monitoring Potable Water Industrial Application Airports Consent Compliance Support Technical Support & Returns Software Updates Remote PC Help Desk WebServer Remote Data Videos Dissolved Oxygen and Solids Test Kits Algal Monitoring Downloads All Products All Services Welcome to Envitech Ltd, a truly comprehensive source of solutions for your environmental and process monitoring needs. Whenever you need to measure something in water or wastewater – we can help. contact us Programmed with more than 100 test methods, the PF12plus is the leading portable photometer from Macherey Nagel A new portable photometer for field and laboratory use. Complete in a case with manual, rechargeable batteries and charger. Based on the successful PF12 photometer, the PF12plus offers great value, unrivalled flexibility and new, unique features. Discover more... The NEW Insite Portable Meter is ideal for carrying out monitoring over a range of locations and parameters The IPM replaces the dedicated DO and SS meters (Insite 3100 and 3150). The new system can take inter-changeable sensors for discrete multi-parameter monitoring. Additionally, the newer unit has more memory and therefore able to log 250 data-points. Click on the links to learn more. BBE Algaetorch can complete a measurement in less than 20 seconds A lightweight instrument for the simultaneous quantification of the chlorophyll-a content of cyanobacteria and the total chlorophyll content of microalgae in water. The measurement of chlorophyll-a using the algaetorch can eliminate laborious sample preparation in the lab Address: Envitech Ltd, Unit S7, Capital Business Park, Parkway, Cardiff, CF3 2PU Telephone: (Mon-Thur 8:00 to 17:30) (Fri 8:30 to 12:00) +44 (0)29 2036 4252 info@envitech.co.uk Privacy Policy Company Registration No: 2404716 VAT Registration No. GB 540 683 447 © 2024 - Envitech Ltd This website uses cookies to improve user experience. By using our website you consent to all cookies in accordance with our Cookie Policy. Accept Read More Privacy & Cookies Policy Close Privacy Overview This website uses cookies to improve your experience while you navigate through the website. Out of these, the cookies that are categorized as necessary are stored on your browser as they are essential for the working of basic functionalities of the ... Necessary Always Enabled Necessary cookies are absolutely essential for the website to function properly. This category only includes cookies that ensures basic functionalities and security features of the website. These cookies do not store any personal information. Any cookies that may not be particularly necessary for the website to function and is used specifically to collect user personal data via analytics, ads, other embedded contents are termed as non-necessary cookies. It is mandatory to procure user consent prior to running these cookies on your website. SAVE & ACCEPT
